pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 20     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0     $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Villager Outpost, Mansion $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)The $(thing)Allay$() wanders around until a $(thing)Player$() gives it an item with their use key. $(br)It starts following the $(thing)Player$(), seeking out dropped versions of the same item and delivering them to it's owner. $(br)If it hears a $(item)Note Block$() play, it spends 30 seconds around that particular note block, seeking items around it and returning them.
